props.name: autoWidth
props.description: If true, the width of the popover will automatically be set according to the items inside the menu

props.name: children
props.description: The option elements to populate the select with

props.name: defaultOpen
props.description: If true, the component is initially open

props.name: defaultValue
props.description: The default value

props.name: disabled
props.description: If true, the select will be disabled

props.name: displayEmpty
props.description: If true, a value is displayed even if no items are selected

props.name: error
props.description: If true, the label will be displayed in an error state

props.name: fullWidth
props.description: If true, the input will take up the full width of its container

props.name: IconComponent
props.description: The icon that displays the arrow

props.name: id
props.description: The id of the wrapper element

props.name: input
props.description: An Input element

props.name: inputProps
props.description: Attributes applied to the input element

props.name: label
props.description: The label content

props.name: labelId
props.description: The ID of an element that acts as an additional label

props.name: MenuProps
props.description: Props applied to the Menu element

props.name: multiple
props.description: If true, value must be an array and the menu will support multiple selections

props.name: name
props.description: Name attribute of the select or hidden input element

props.name: native
props.description: If true, the component will be using a native select element

props.name: onChange
props.description: Callback fired when a menu item is selected

props.name: onClose
props.description: Callback fired when the component requests to be closed

props.name: onOpen
props.description: Callback fired when the component requests to be opened

props.name: open
props.description: If true, the component is shown

props.name: renderValue
props.description: Render the selected value

props.name: required
props.description: If true, the label is displayed as required

props.name: value
props.description: The input value

props.name: variant
props.description: The variant to use
